text: What happened to the new book partially tape-recorded by his publishers in March of last year? Still a skeleton. Yet I have before me now a 12,000-word manuscript of a book planned to be called Confessions of an Irish Rebel which was delivered to his agents in June. IT begins:
handwritten_text: Whot hoppe to the nu book potoly topreconded by his publishes in rsch of lst yess? skil sstelbn.kt
name: Deirdre
